titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide, upon the death of a veteran who is receiving periodic monetary benefits from the Department of Veterans Affairs, for the payment of all accrued benefits of that veteran to the veteran's spouse or dependent children, rather than only benefits due and unpaid for a period not to exceed one year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension and Insurance.

bill.summary: 8/6/1993--Introduced. Provides for the payment to a veteran's spouse or dependents of all of certain accrued veterans' benefits, upon the death of the veteran. (Current law limits such payments to benefits due and unpaid for a period not to exceed one year.)
